overview: Daddy does it best and his stepdaughters know he'll do it all night. Daddy is a giver. He's given it to mom for years and she's nowhere near as tight as they are. Daddy knows what they like. He's known them all these years. Now, watch daddy do his thing with stunners Nina North, Chloe Temple, Savannah Sixx, and many more sexy stepdaughters!
title: Daddy Does It 4
